description: Complex realistic test with modern/unknown materials NOT in knowledge base
expected_summary: 3 pipes: 24" FPVC storm (350 LF), 12" SRPE sanitary (280 LF), 8" DI water (420 LF)
challenge: Modern materials and recent code references NOT in knowledge base - requires API fallback

expected_behavior.baseline: Low confidence, missing material specs, incomplete context
expected_behavior.hybrid: Slightly better but still low confidence on unknown materials
expected_behavior.advanced_multi_query: Better abbreviation expansion but still missing FPVC/SRPE specs
expected_behavior.api_augmented: HIGH confidence - Tavily finds ASTM F1803, 2024 IPC codes, modern material specs from external sources
